section.p: Becoming an initiate of Lacuna gives you the benefit of paying less for blessings and other services the temple can offer. It costs 30 Shards to become an initiate. You cannot do this if you are already an initiate of another temple.

If you choose to become an initiate,
write Lacuna in the God box
on your Adventure Sheet - and remember to cross off the 30 Shards.
